triples.name: Vertebrate
triples.relevance: Vertebrates are the primary focus as indicators of extinction crisis and biological annihilation.

triples.name: Holocene extinction
triples.relevance: The paper discusses the ongoing sixth mass extinction event, which is also known as the Holocene extinction.

triples.name: Extinction
triples.relevance: Species extinction is the central phenomenon being studied and documented in the paper.

triples.name: Biodiversity
triples.relevance: Biodiversity loss and collapse are key concerns discussed as consequences of the extinction crisis.

triples.name: Ecosystem collapse
triples.relevance: The paper warns that regional biodiversity collapses are likely occurring in regions with disappearing species.

triples.name: Endangered species
triples.relevance: The paper discusses critically endangered vertebrate species as indicators of the ongoing extinction crisis.
